== WordPress 0.70 ==

* Released May 27, 2003
* [http://wordpress.org/development/archives/2003/05/27/wordpress-now-available/ Dev Blog Announcment]

This was the very first version of WordPress, and represented a great deal of work between Mike and Matt in improving the b2 codebase.

=== Features ===

* Texturize engine
* Links manager
* XHTML 1.1 compliant templates
* New administration interface
* Ability to do manual excerpts
* New templates
